parikara：m．[＜pari-kṛ] 帶，腰帶，圍裙，腰的圍繞物（girdle，loincloth）．

Parikara，[fr．pari+kṛ； a similar formation belonging to same root，but with fig．meaning is to be found in parikkhāra，which is also expld by parivara cp．parikaroti=parivāreti] “doing round，” i．e．girdle，loincloth J．IV，149； DhA．I，352．-- In cpd．ovāda° it is v．l．SS at D．I，137 for paṭikara （q．v．）．（Page 422）

parikara：ပရိ-ကရ （ပ）
ပတ်ရစ်ခြင်း။
